name: Evolve
description:
Through a set of proprietary data and algorithms, we are building a unique, prescreened, trusted, anonymous and invite-only platform. We are delivering this through a beautiful, seamless, mobile-first, exciting Tribal concept.

We're launching in May 2020 (predominantly as an App), across 3 different countries with over 40 multinational employers.

team.name: Marian MAZAROVICI
team.bioHtml: Entrepreneurial tech lead, co-founder of a successful marketing tech startup

jobs.title: Senior Mobile Frontend Engineer - React Native
jobs.description:
Launching in May 2020 (predominantly as an App), across 3 different countries with over 40 multinational employers, we are incredibly excited to find a Senior Frontend Engineer to join us in building the frontend of our mobile and web app. We have already secured initial capital and will be seeking a Series A in the next 12 months. Our CEO & Founder, Charles Taylor is a Forbes (30 under 30) award-winning technology entrepreneur and founder of the Google award-winning student careers app, Debut. Charles raised millions from Angel and Venture Capitalist funding over 3 years with Debut. This previous success has compelled a number of serial investors to back him in his latest and grandest start-up yet. 

For the right person, this is a huge opportunity to make your mark on a greenfield project, from writing the first lines of code, through delivering the product to mobile platforms and scaling it to serve a global audience - and supercharge your own career trajectory in the process. There is no limit to what you can achieve here at Evolve if you’re dedicated and ambitious.


As a Senior Frontend Engineer, you will work alongside the Head of Engineering to drive the technical implementation of our main mobile app and have ownership of a greenfield project.
You will:
* Own technical development for the mobile front-end and be the go-to expert on mobile development 
* Build, test and ship customer-facing features that look and feel native using tools and frameworks like React/Vue, React Native, Typescript, ES6, Redux etc. 
* Write, test and review code as part of a multi-skilled development team 
* As required, leverage native APIs for deeper integrations with iOS/Android platforms. 
* Improve the build process and deployment to allow the delivery of features and fixes to customers quickly 
* Use agile practices to provide a foundation for iterative product development 
* Share technical solutions and product ideas and actively contribute to the future of the product 

About You
Our ideal candidate has:
* 5+ years of commercial experience with Javascript 
* Demonstrated expertise with a modern Javascript framework like React.js or Vue.js 
* Deep understanding and extensive experience with building and delivering native mobile apps using React Native 
* Proficiency with HTML, CSS and mobile/web UI in general 
* Experience with any of the following: GraphQL, TypeScript, AWS Amplify, Swift, Android/iOS SDK 
* A product mindset - an adept of experimenting to find innovative solutions to real customer problems 

Bonus points
* Previous experience with early-stage startups 
* Experience with serverless architecture, AWS Lambda 
* An eye for beautiful, clean user experience 
 

What we’re offering
* World-class startup environment 
* Competitive salary and equity package 
* Opportunity and freedom to make an impact on exciting and challenging business problems 
* Fast career progress, professional development and mentoring 
* Flexible work schedule, work from home days 
* Fantastic office environment, VR games, meditation rooms, regular events, etc. 
* Casual and relaxed dress code
